| `icon`    | `icon`    | Defines the icon `name` inside of the component. <span className="banner banner-sm banner-info">If not set the icon will not show up.</span> To learn which icons are available, please visit our <a href="/?path=/docs/5704bdc4-c5b5-45e6-b123-c54d01fce2f1--docs">icon library</a>. | `string`                                                             | `null`      |
| `size`    | `size`    | Defines the size of the component.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `"sm"`                                                               | `null`      |
| `variant` | `variant` | Defines the color variant of the component.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "white" \| "yellow"` | `undefined` |
